title: WB VP, South Asia calls on PM
content:
ISLAMABAD, May 10 (APP): Vice-President for South Asia Region, World Bank, Hartwig Schafer Tuesday called on Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif.
Welcoming the vice-president, the prime minister appreciated the support of the World Bank in the socio-economic development of Pakistan.
He expressed the desire to further strengthen the cooperation between the two sides, especially in the fields of agriculture, vocational training and energy.
Both sides agreed to remain in close contact and work together for achieving shared objectives.
